info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 30 at 1:57PM CDT until March 30 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
FFWLIX
The National Weather Service in New Orleans has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in southern Mississippi...
* Until 315 PM CDT.
* At 157 PM CDT, Emergency management reported roads impassable in northern Jackson County. Between 5 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
This is a FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY for Northern Jackson County near wade and north of Vancleave. This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW!
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Emergency management reported.
IMPACT...This is a PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. SEEK HIGHER GROUND NOW! Life threatening flash flooding of low water crossings, small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Vancleave and Wade.
info.instruction:
Move to higher ground now! This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR NORTHERN JACKSON COUNTY NEAR WADE AND NORTH OF VANCLEAVE
NWS: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY this area til 3:15 PM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY is in effect for this area until 3:15 PM CDT. This is an extremely dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY FOR NORTHERN JACKSON COUNTY NEAR WADE AND NORTH OF VANCLEAVE
SNM: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:15 PM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: EMERGENCIA DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:15 PM CDT. Esta es una situacion extremadamente peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
